sync_mode.title: Sync Mode
sync_mode.description:
If set to true, the function will wait for the image to be generated
            and uploaded before returning the response. This will increase the
            latency of the function but it allows you to get the image directly
            in the response without going through the CDN.

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video.

examples: A cinematic video begins with a woman standing in an art studio, wearing a paint-splattered apron over a white off-shoulder blouse, surrounded by colorful canvases on easels. She gently plays with her hair for a moment, then straightens her head and looks directly at the camera with a warm smile. After holding the smile, she gracefully twirls around in place, her apron flowing slightly with the motion, creating a playful and artistic atmosphere against the backdrop of her vibrant paintings.
prompt.description: Text description of the desired video content
prompt.title: Prompt

image_url.title: Image Url
image_url.description: URL of the image to use as the first frame

video.title: Video
video.description: The generated MP4 video with H.264 encoding

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
